Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'}
Review Text: This barber kit includes scissors, combs, and other items used by barbers. This all fits in a carry bag and would be fine for any amateur or professional hair stylist. The items are good quality and are affordably priced when you purchase them all together in this kit.
Review Title: Everything you'd need for manual hair cutting
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
Charcoal Teeth Whitening Powder,from Organic Coconut Shell and Food Grade Formula - All Natural Freshmint Flavor Tooth Whitener 30 g by Gemmaz
NUTRILUSH
['How To Use:', '1. Wet toothbrush.2. Dip brush into charcoal powder.3. Brush gently for 1-2 minutes, paying special attention to stained teeth.4. Rinse mouth well with water.', 'Cautions:', '-Charcoal can stain grout and fabrics. Protect counters, floors and clothing before using.- If you have crowns, caps or porcelain veneers, it’s possible that activated charcoal may stain them.- Keep out of reach of children.- Avoid contact with eyes. - Stop use if irritation Occurs.', 'Storage Conditions:', '(1)It should be stored in cool and dryplace. Pleaseavoid direct sunlight and do not expose to any high temperature.(2)Our teeth whitening powder can remove most of teeth stains from coffee, wine, tea and tobacco. But this product is not bleach. If your enamel is naturally discolored, this product will not help whiten, but is still an excellent natural daily toothpaste alternative!', 'Ingredients:', 'Activated Charcoal from Coconut, Calcium Carbonate, Sorbitol, Sodium Bicarbonate, Cellulose Microcrystalline, DendrobiumOfficinale Kimura et Migo, Resveratrol, Natural Freshmint Flavor, Stevia']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.5 x 5.5 x 1.1 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'NUTRILUSH'}
These multi-colored, multi-use clips can be used for a variety of projects. This resealable bag contains 100 of the clips. The spring mechanism on the clips is of adequate strength for use in many arts and crafts applications. Having the mix of colors is useful. These are both attractive and practical, and this is a good value for this number of clips. I was provided a free sample of these for my honest, unbiased review.
Great bag of multi-colored wonder clips for crafts
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack)
POWERGROOMING
{'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'}
This is a basic nail clipping set with a clipper and file. The clipper has a nice look and a smooth cut, with a special material on its edge (feels like silicone) that makes it easy and comfortable to grip. There is a storage case with a snap to close it. If you need these simple nail clipping tools this set is fine, though a bit expensive.
A nail clipper and file with storage case
Nail Clipper Set, 19 In 1 Manicure Pedicure Ear Picking Tool Set, Tools For Nail, Cutter Kits, Includes Cuticle Remover with Portable, Nail Tools with Luxurious Travel Case
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.22 x 3.31 x 0.91 inches; 9.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '759675599820'}
This is a set of manicure and pedicure tools that includes pretty much all the clippers and instruments you would need to use. These function well and they also have an attractive design that will appeal especially to girls. The case is nice and it matches the tools. This would make a nice gift.
An attractive, flashy manicure/pedicure tool set
Eye Mask Natural Mulberry 100% Silk Super Smooth Sleep Eye Mask for Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes for Dry Eyes for Dark Circles Sleeping Travel While Camping Multi Purpose Men and Women Eye Mask
{'Package Dimensions': '7.3 x 1.6 x 0.4 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
This eye mask fits comfortably and feels smooth on your face. It functions as desired for blocking out light and helping you relax and sleep. It is not substantially different than other silk eye masks I have tried, while it is not the least expensive option and it doesn't come with any box or bag to store it in.
A simple smooth silk eye mask
Wig Head Wig Stands (Purple)
BAIHONG
{'Manufacturer': 'XUCHANG BAIHONG HAIR PRODUCTS CO., LTD.'}
This package includes a pair of scalp massaging brushes along with a stretchable shower cap. The brushes have points with silicone tips so you can safely stimulate your scalp as you wash your head and hair. They feel OK, though not as good as manually massaging your scalp since the brush doesn't have the dexterity of fingers. These are nice to have although I don't expect to rely on them too much. For what is included in this package it seems reasonably priced.
Silicone tipped scalp massage brushes along with shower hair cap
AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids
AUGNORYE

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Health-Conscious:** Consistently prefers natural and organic products, emphasizing choices that promote well-being and comfort.
- **Aesthetic & Practical:** Values stylish yet functional items that enhance both visual appeal and usability, particularly in grooming and personal care.
- **Quality and Value-Oriented:** Strives for a balance between cost and performance, favoring mid-range products that provide aesthetic charm and effective functionality, especially when they offer a good value for quality.
- **Detail-Oriented:** Focuses on clear product instructions and safety guidelines, prioritizing items that maximize effectiveness and ease of use.
- **Positive User Experience:** Reflects a critical assessment in purchases, maintaining an average product rating around 4.3 stars, showcasing a desire for satisfactory performance and design.
- **Varied Interests:** Engages with a diverse range of health-focused and personal care items, with an ongoing interest in grooming, including professional styling tools.
- **Gift-Considerate:** Seeks versatile products that can serve as thoughtful gifts while emphasizing functionality and design.
- **Recent Trends:** The latest interaction emphasizes a continued pursuit of well-designed grooming tools that promote comfort and efficiency, reinforcing a preference for practical features combined with aesthetic appeal and budget-conscious choices. This interaction also indicates an appreciation for comprehensive kits that cater both to amateur and professional needs, highlighting a commitment to quality at an accessible price point.
